categories.description: category that will be assigned to a pull request depending on its score

label.description: A visual label that should be used to represent this category

name.description: name of the label that should be used to represent this category

description.description: describes the meaning of the label that will be used to represent this category

color.description: preferred CSS hex color label that should be used to represent this category

lte.description: inclusive upper bound on the score that a pull request must have to be assigned this category

formula.description: an expression, written in prefix-notation, that describes how to combine features to produce a score

aliases.description: named expression aliases, each of which can be used as shortand in a formula

testFilePatterns.description: glob expressions matching file patterns that should be considered as tests during the scoring process

ignoredFilePatterns.description: glob expressions matching file patterns that are ignored in the scoring process
